entries: Each creature of the warrior's choice within 5 feet gains an +1 bonus to their AC and to their Strength and Dexterity saving throws. The warrior must be wielding a {@item Shield|XPHB} and not {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} to grant this bonus. A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.

Each creature of the warrior's choice within 5 feet gains an +2 bonus to their AC and to their Strength and Dexterity saving throws. The warrior must be wielding a {@item Shield|XPHB} and not {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} to grant this bonus. A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two weapon attacks.

reaction.name: Sentinel's Strike
entries: When a creature the warrior can see enters its reach or makes an attack against a creature other than the warrior while within its reach, the warrior can make a special Opportunity Attack with its Spear.
